Module project.notizprogrammrepository
Package project.notizprogrammrepository.controller

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
project.notizprogrammrepository.controller.Controller
public class Controller extends Object
The Controller creates and provides the data stored in the Application. Furthermore, it manages saving and loading of data to the users device.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description

    application
    The main component of the application containing all data.

    The path to the directory containing the save file.

    The name of the save file.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Controller()
    Loads the saved data or creates a new Application if no save file is found.

  • Method Details

    • closeApplication

      public void closeApplication()
      Saves the data of the Application into the specified file.

    • switchToCalendar

      public Month switchToCalendar()
      Changes the mode to calendarMode and returns the current month.
      Returns:
      The month active when last opening the calendar or the current month.

    • switchToNote

      public Month switchToNote()
      Changes the mode to noteMode and returns the current month.
      Returns:
      The month active when last opening the calendar or the current month.

    • switchToTodo

      public ArrayList<TodoEntry> switchToTodo()
      Changes mode to todoMode and returns the todolist.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of TodoEntries containing the todolist.

    • switchToCollectionMode

      public ArrayList<String> switchToCollectionMode()
      Changes mode to collectionMode and returns a list of the titles of currently active collections.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of strings containing the titles of all collections which can then be used to get the collection using "getCollection".

    • switchToWeekView

      public Day[] switchToWeekView(Mode mode)
      Switches to weekView if necessary and returns the current week.
      Parameters:
      mode - The mode from which the week is requested.
      Returns:
      The current week of the specified mode.
      Throws:
      ClassCastException - if mode == Subject.TODO

    • switchToMonthView

      public Month switchToMonthView(Mode mode)
      Switches to monthView if necessary and returns the current month.
      Parameters:
      mode - The mode from which the month is requested.
      Returns:
      The current month of the specified mode.
      Throws:
      ClassCastException - if mode == Subject.TODO

    • changeEntry

      public void changeEntry(Entry oldEntry, Entry newEntry, boolean absolute)
      Changes the contents of the oldEntry to the contents of the newEntry. If oldEntry is null newEntry is simply added. If newEntry is null the oldEntry is removed.
      Parameters:
      oldEntry - The Entry to be changed or null for adding newEntry.
      newEntry - A new Entry Object containing the data to be put into oldEntry or null for removing oldEntry.
      absolute - A flag used for Notes only, defining whether they will be removed from collections on deletion.

    • getCollection

      public NoteCollection getCollection(String title)
      Gets the Collection of the specified title.
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the collection.
      Returns:
      The desired Collection or null if there is no Collection with the specified title.

    • getApplication

      public Application getApplication()
      Returns the currently running Application.
      Returns:
      The Application-object currently in use.
